# Figure 2

```{r}
overall_ci  <- 
  TSH_long %>% 
  filter(!is.na(Sig)) %>% 
  group_by(Thyroid_test) %>% 
  summarise(
    n_sig = sum(Sig == "Y"), 
    N = n(), 
    p = n_sig / N,
    lwr = p - 1.96 * sqrt(p * (1 - p) / N),
    upr = p + 1.96 * sqrt(p * (1 - p) / N)
  )
```


```{r}
ggplot(overall_ci, aes( Thyroid_test, p, col = Thyroid_test)) + 
  geom_point() + 
  geom_errorbar(aes(ymin = lwr, ymax = upr), width = 0.1) + 
  theme(legend.position = "none") + 
  labs(y = "Proportion of results that showed a statistically \nsignificant association with clinical parameters.", x = "Thyroid test") + 
  scale_x_discrete(label = c("Free T4", "Free T3 / Total T3", "TSH")) + 
  theme(text = element_text(family = "Times New Roman", size = 12))
```

```{r}
ggsave("../figs/Figure_2.tiff", width = 6, height = 6, dpi = dpi)
```

# Figure 3

```{r}
p  <- visualise_ci(TSH_long, N_bin)
p +
  labs(y = "Proportion of results that showed a statistically \nsignificant association with clinical parameters.", 
       x = "Number of subjects", 
       col = "Thyroid test") + 
  scale_x_discrete(
    label = c("0 - 1010", "1011 - 1580", 
              "1581 - 2390", "2391 - 3650", 
              "3651 - 10314")
  ) + 
  scale_color_discrete(
    label = c("Free T4", "Free T3 / Total T3", "TSH")
  ) + 
  theme(text = element_text(family = "Times New Roman", size = 12))
```

```{r}
ggsave("../figs/Figure_3.tiff", width = 6, height = 6, dpi = dpi)
```
